name: Through the Galaxy
storyline:
Embark on an exciting adventure in space in "Through the Galaxy". Explore an unknown galaxy by continuously upgrading your spaceship and progressing bit by bit. In this thrilling mix of adventure and action, the focus is on collecting resources and fast-paced battles. Gain valuable resources from crates, mines and battles to upgrade your spaceship. Experience the best of both worlds: the intense thrill of a bullet hell/heaven game and the relaxing atmosphere of a casual/cozy game. Each run takes place near different planets and offers you the opportunity to make great progress in a short time - perfect for players who want to experience the best of both worlds: the intense thrill of a Bullet Hell/Heaven game and the relaxing atmosphere of a casual/cozy game. Each run takes place near different planets, giving you the opportunity to make great progress in a short amount of time - perfect for players who want to jump in and out at any time. The charming 2D cartoon graphic style makes "Through the Galaxy" not only playable but also visually appealing. Immerse yourself in a unique gaming experience that seamlessly blends adventure, action and cozy gameplay.
